org.mt4j.input.inputSources
Class AbstractInputSource

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.input.inputSources.AbstractInputSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreDrawAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
KeyboardInputSource, MacTrackpadSource, MouseInputSource, MuitoInputSource, MultipleMiceInputSource, Win7NativeTouchSource
public abstract class AbstractInputSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPreDrawAction

An abstract superclass for the abstraction of input sources. Input source listener can listen to events from the inputsource.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

Constructor Summary

          Instantiates a new abstract input source.

onRegistered

public void onRegistered()
Called by the inputmanager when this inputsource is registered with the application. This method should not be invoked directly!

enqueueInputEvent

protected void enqueueInputEvent(MTInputEvent inputEvt)
Queue input event for firing. They will be fired automatically before the next frame in snychronization with the render thread. Use this method instead of fireInputEvent()!

Parameters:
inputEvt - the input evt

pre

public void pre()
The input events have to be fired in processings (and openGL's) thread. Called by processing. This method should not be invoked directly!

flushEvents

public void flushEvents()
Flushes the events.

NOTE: not threadsafe! Has to be called in the opengl thread if in opengl mode!

addInputListener

Adds the input listener.

public void removeInputListener(IinputSourceListener listener)

getInputListeners

public IinputSourceListener[] getInputListeners()
Gets the input listeners.

the input listeners
